Posts.Content: Good Luck, hope all goes well for you xxx
Posts.Title: Cancer for a second time

Posts.Content: Hi there, in the same boat with my mum, she has recurrence of breast cancer where is the implant is!  full body scan for spread is worrying me more.  good luck with your result and hope the breast cancer is contained x
Posts.Title: Cancer for a second time

Posts.Content: Hi ya,  I'm so sorry to hear that, off course you are upset,  but you got through once so you can do it again. Did you have to take a tablet last time after your treatment? xxx  im okay thank you, worried about my mums result CT results, know her BC has come back, so waiting to see if she is okay everywhere else in the body. xxx
